name: Animal Tanks
description:
This is a group project for our Level Design Class at the University of Texas at Austin.

When we were put into a group initially, we started writing down all the different ideas as soon as they came to our heads. At the end of our discussions we came up with two things: "Animals" and "Tanks." So, we combined them.

Journey through a world where you, a pet tank, follow your store owner's every command. nageM is the person who created you, and wants revenge against the British for stealing her (black market) profit margins. Will you be able to fight out the British's pet tank army or will you succumb to their numbers?

Controls: WASD - Move | Left Mouse button - Shoot |  M - Display Menu | Spacebar - Skip Cutscene/Begin Play

This release version is Unlimited Ammo Mode, which means upgrades are currently disabled.
